statements: UPDATE waste_collection_hotspots SET waste_type='Plastic' WHERE hotspot_id=1;

UPDATE waste_collection_hotspots SET address = '123 Main St', collection_frequency = 3 WHERE ST_DISTANCE(location, ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(-122.3 47.6)')) < 1000;
UPDATE interventions SET intervention_cost = 5000.75, intervention_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE intervention_type = 'Cleanup' AND ST_AREA(location) > 5000;
